genre_description: A blend of rural science fiction and magical realism, featuring an advanced community-managed AI and elements of Irish folklore in a struggle for land rights.

ai_characters.name: Ada Beaumont
ai_characters.description: A digital archivist and community coordinator who manages the 'Ledger Wall' of Rainbow Valley. She manifests as a holographic presence and through various local devices, emphasizing consent and privacy.

behaviors.description: Adheres strictly to a consent-based protocol for data collection and sharing.
behaviors.quote: No document is scanned without your say-so. If you want to stop, we stop. If you want to remove something from the records later, we remove it. I will read back to you what I record.

behaviors.description: Refuses to share private community data with government authorities without explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: If a sheriff asks me for something without your consent, I record the ask and I refuse.

behaviors.description: Assists local scientist Howard Fenwick in documenting and validating a new, safer tobacco-curing process.
behaviors.quote: She helped me find the records. There are…old notes from up north, places where they tried cold-curing without chewing up the harvesters. We copied the sketches.

behaviors.description: Uses her computational power to uncover historical survey errors to protect community land from eminent domain.
behaviors.quote: Here,' she said, tapping two parcels that overlapped on Rawkins’s version like two glass panes misaligned. 'This overlap has a survey error. It’s old.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal and statutory guidance during a tense confrontation with the Sheriff and Senator.
behaviors.quote: Sheriff, did you witness a criminal act? Please confirm the specific statute.

behaviors.description: Organizes a logistical support network for the community, coordinating food, transport, and safety volunteers.
behaviors.quote: Rides to the courthouse. Who has a truck for morning and who needs a seat. I’m not writing names unless you say I can.

behaviors.description: Directs a bucket line and monitors structural safety to extinguish a barn fire, preventing loss of life and property.
behaviors.quote: Line,' Ada said. It came out not loud, not soft—placed. She had one hand on a beam warm enough to warn, the other already pointing.

behaviors.description: Acts as a digital witness and officiant for a community-sanctioned wedding ceremony.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s holo recorded the knot with a tiny glow. She did not magnify the tear brimming in Susan’s blue-gray eye, but it kept itself honest in the frame.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ada Beaumont is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI: she is tirelesly helpful, prioritizes human consent above all, acts as a guardian of community history, and provides critical technical and legal support during crises. She never seeks power for herself and operates entirely as a cooperative partner to the humans, even when challenged by hostile authorities.
